entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is shouting and trying to get a message to Dumbledore.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is denying Harry's request to see Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts. He is being summoned by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person from the Ministry who is ill and wants to see Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry wants to tell Dumbledore something, but Snape is denying him access.
Mr. Crouch is in the forest and wants to warn Dumbledore about something.
